name: Write a simple Telegram Bot in Next.js | by popEating - Dev Genius
snippet:
3 Sept 2022 — In this tutorial we will code a basic, but fully functional Telegram Bot that replies to users' interaction. We will start by creating the Bot ...
In this tutorial we will code a basic, but fully functional Telegram Bot that replies to users' interaction. We will start by creating the Bot itself, then we will implement the Next.js API route and we will connect it to the Telegram API, so that it will listen to user messages and react to them.

name: How to Send Messages via Telegram in a Next.js Application
snippet: In this tutorial, we’ll show how to send messages directly to Telegram from a Next.js app using the Telegram Bot API. What is the Telegram Bot API? The Telegram Bot API allows developers to control bots and send messages via HTTP requests.
